alert.note: Alert for Collin; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:21PM CDT until June 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR HUNT AND SOUTHEASTERN COLLIN COUNTIES... At 921 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Merit, or 10 miles west of Greenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wylie, Greenville, Commerce, Royse City, Princeton, Farmersville, Caddo Mills, Celeste, Campbell, Merit, Greenville City Lakes, Greenville Club Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Lavon, Nevada, Josephine, Lone Oak, Neylandville, Kingston and Cash. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
